dates.name: Beach Picnic at South Pointe Park
dates.description: Enjoy a romantic beach picnic at South Pointe Park in South Florida. This scenic park offers stunning ocean views, a relaxing atmosphere, and plenty of open space for couples to unwind. Bring your own food or grab takeout from nearby cafes. The park also features walking trails and a pier, perfect for a leisurely stroll before or after your meal.

dates.name: Wynwood Walls Art Walk
dates.description: Explore the vibrant street art of the famous Wynwood Walls in Miami, South Florida. This free outdoor museum showcases breathtaking murals created by artists from around the world. It's a perfect affordable date idea for couples who love art, culture, and photography. The surrounding area also offers trendy bars, coffee shops, and restaurants to extend your outing.

dates.name: Kayaking at Oleta River State Park
dates.description: For adventurous couples, Oleta River State Park in South Florida is a fantastic affordable date option. Rent a kayak and paddle through peaceful mangrove trails while enjoying nature and wildlife sightings. This relaxing outdoor activity is great for bonding and offers a refreshing escape from the city.

dates.name: Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden
dates.description: Take a romantic walk through the stunning Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden, one of South Florida’s most beautiful green spaces. The garden features lush tropical plants, butterfly exhibits, and serene lakes. It’s a perfect date idea for nature-loving couples looking for a peaceful and affordable escape.

dates.name: Movies at Rooftop Cinema Club
dates.description: Enjoy a unique movie experience at the Rooftop Cinema Club in Miami, South Florida. Watch classic and new films under the stars in a cozy rooftop setting. This affordable date idea offers a romantic ambiance with comfortable seating and great skyline views, perfect for couples who love movies.

dates.name: Sunset Cruise in Fort Lauderdale
dates.description: Take in breathtaking views on an affordable sunset cruise along the waterways of Fort Lauderdale. This relaxing date idea offers couples a chance to enjoy the scenic coastline while unwinding with a peaceful boat ride. Some cruises even provide drinks and live music, making it a memorable experience.

dates.name: Stargazing at Bill Baggs Cape Florida State Park
dates.description: Escape the city lights and enjoy a romantic stargazing experience at Bill Baggs Cape Florida State Park. This hidden gem in South Florida offers quiet beaches and stunning nighttime skies, perfect for couples looking for a peaceful and intimate date. Bring a blanket and relax under the stars for an unforgettable night.

dates.name: Live Jazz at The Corner Bar
dates.description: For a cozy and romantic night out, visit The Corner Bar in downtown Miami for live jazz music. This intimate venue offers a relaxing atmosphere, making it a perfect date spot for couples who enjoy music and craft cocktails. It’s an affordable option for a laid-back evening filled with great vibes.

dates.name: Snorkeling at Lauderdale-By-The-Sea
dates.description: Experience the beauty of South Florida’s underwater world by snorkeling at Lauderdale-By-The-Sea. This affordable date activity is perfect for adventurous couples who love the ocean. Swim among colorful fish and coral reefs just a short distance from the shore, making it a convenient and memorable outing.
dates.price: Free (bring your own gear) or rental costs

dates.name: Sunrise Yoga on the Beach
dates.description: Start your day with a relaxing and romantic sunrise yoga session on one of South Florida’s beautiful beaches. Many local instructors offer affordable or donation-based classes right on the sand. This is a refreshing way to connect with your partner while enjoying the peaceful morning atmosphere.
